newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 30.468 (30.472).
newsitem.headline: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 30.468 (30.472).

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) fixed the crown at 30.468 to the dollar after Monday's fixing at 30.472, and at 20.446 to the mark from 20.444.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (0940 GMT), and is within plus/minus 5.0 percent of a dollar/mark basket midpoint calculated at exactly 11:30:00 CET.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of +0.30 percent, after a deviation of +0.30 percent on Monday.
